metadata.title: CVE-2025-24158 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin visionOS 2.3, Safari 18.3, iOS 18.3 and iPadOS 18.3, macOS Sequoia 15.3,watchOS 11.3, tvOS 18.3. Processing web content may lead to adenial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
